name: Breeze Wanderer
description:
Breeze Wanderer is a game I've made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 43 - an accelerated game development competition.  

It is a puzzle game where you have to push the balloons towards the finish point, by any means. 

There are 10 levels in total.

How to play

Left click on the fans to activate them.

Press 'R' to restart the level.

 Reach the blue rectangle (the finish point) with at least one ballon to get to the next level .

Source code

The game was made using Java and libGDX. 

It's also open-source, and you can find the source code here. 

Credits

looperman for music

freesound for sound effects
